name: GunyMcGunFace VS Celestial Horrors
description:
GunyMcGunFace VS Celestial Horrors is the first game from two random university students who barely know how to make a game but really like GMTK's videos. It's about a minigun who got brought to life by Cthulu and now it wants to kill everything. By the way, celestial horrors have families too so you're actually the bad guy. It matches the theme because shooting also moves you. We made almost everything by ourselves except the sound which is listed below. 

Engine

Unity 5.6.1 Personal Edition
